title: Estimated decrease of GDP in Japan due to earthquake and tsunami 2011
summary: The statistic shows the most viewed Estimated on Decrease in Japan 2011 .
Total was the Category with the highest GDP billion in 2011 with a GDP of 70.0 billion viewers .
gold: The statistic shows an estimate for the decrease of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Japan due to the effects of the earthquake and tsunami in 2011 by sector.
Production in Japan is estimated to decrease by 45.4 billion euros due to the natural disaster .
